alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 20 at 1:59PM MDT until October 23 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches below 7000 feet and upwards of 10 inches above 7000 feet and across ridge tops and passes. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Centennial, Island Park, and Big Hole Mountains, including the Monida Pass area, Targhee Pass, and Pine Creek Pass. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times with areas of blowing snow across mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
